verses.verse: The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> even the whole <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3427>stayed<s%> in <S%H6946>Kadesh;<s%> and <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H6912>there,<s%> and was buried there.
There was no <S%H4325>water<s%> for the <S%H5712>congregation:<s%> and they <S%H6950>assembled<s%> themselves together against <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and against <S%H175>Aaron.<s%>

The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7378>strove<s%> with <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H559>spoke,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "We wish <S%H3863>that<s%> we had <S%H1478>died<s%> when our <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H1478>died<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh!<s%>
Why have you <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> into this <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> that we should <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H1165>there,<s%> we and our animals?

Why have you made us to come <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> us in to this <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4725>place?<s%> It is no <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H2233>seed,<s%> or of <S%H8384>figs,<s%> or of <S%H1612>vines,<s%> or of <S%H7416>pomegranates;<s%> neither is there any <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H8354>drink.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> on their <S%H6440>faces:<s%> and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> appeared to <S%H7200>them.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3947>"Take<s%> the <S%H4294>rod,<s%> and <S%H6950>assemble<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H175>you,<s%> and Aaron your <S%H251>brother,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H5553>rock<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> that it give <S%H5414>forth<s%> its <S%H4325>water;<s%> and you shall bring <S%H5414>forth<s%> to them <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock;<s%> so you shall <S%H8248>give<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> and their livestock <S%H8248>drink.<s%>"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H4294>rod<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> as he commanded <S%H6680>him.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6950>gathered<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> together <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5553>rock,<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8085>them,<s%> "Hear <S%H4784>now,<s%> you rebels; shall we <S%H3318>bring<s%> you <S%H4325>water<s%> out of this rock for <S%H5553>you?<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H5553>rock<s%> with his <S%H4294>rod<s%> <S%H6471>twice:<s%> and <S%H4325>water<s%> came <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H7227>abundantly,<s%> and the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H8354>drank,<s%> and their <S%H1165>livestock.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> "Because you <S%H539>didn't<s%> believe in <S%H6942>me,<s%> to sanctify me in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> therefore you shall not <S%H935>bring<s%> this <S%H6951>assembly<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> which I have given <S%H5414>them.<s%>"

These <S%H1992>are<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4809>Meribah;<s%> because the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7378>strove<s%> with <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and he was sanctified in <S%H6942>them.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> from <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> <S%H559>saying:<s%> "Thus says your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> You <S%H3045>know<s%> all the <S%H8513>travail<s%> that has happened to <S%H4672>us:<s%>

how our <S%H1>fathers<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and we <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> a <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>time;<s%> and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> dealt <S%H7489>ill<s%> with <S%H1>us,<s%> and our fathers:

and when we <S%H6817>cried<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> he <S%H8085>heard<s%> our <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> an <S%H4397>angel,<s%> and brought us <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> and <S%H6946>behold,<s%> we are in Kadesh, a <S%H5892>city<s%> in the <S%H7097>uttermost<s%> of your <S%H1366>border.<s%>

"Please let us <S%H5674>pass<s%> through your <S%H776>land:<s%> we will not <S%H5674>pass<s%> through <S%H7704>field<s%> or through <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> neither will we <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H875>wells:<s%> we will <S%H3212>go<s%> along the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1870>highway;<s%> we will not <S%H5186>turn<s%> aside to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> nor to the <S%H8040>left,<s%> until we have <S%H5674>passed<s%> your <S%H1366>border.<s%>"
<S%H123>Edom<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5674>him,<s%> "You shall not pass through <S%H3318>me,<s%> lest I come out with the <S%H2719>sword<s%> against <S%H7125>you.<s%>"

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5927>him,<s%> "We will go up by the <S%H4546>highway;<s%> and if we <S%H8354>drink<s%> of your <S%H4325>water,<s%> I and my <S%H4735>livestock,<s%> then will I <S%H5414>give<s%> its <S%H1697>price:<s%> let me only, without doing anything <S%H5674>else,<s%> pass through on my <S%H7272>feet.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "You shall not pass <S%H5674>through.<s%>" <S%H123>Edom<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> him with <S%H3515>many<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and with a <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
Thus <S%H123>Edom<s%> <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5674>passage<s%> through his <S%H1366>border,<s%> so <S%H3478>Israel<s%> turned away from <S%H5186>him.<s%>

They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H6946>Kadesh:<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> even the whole <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> in <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor,<s%> by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H175>"Aaron<s%> shall be <S%H622>gathered<s%> to his <S%H5971>people;<s%> for he shall not <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> which I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> because you rebelled <S%H4784>against<s%> my <S%H6310>word<s%> at the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4809>Meribah.<s%>
<S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and bring them <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor;<s%>

and <S%H6584>strip<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> of his <S%H899>garments,<s%> and <S%H3847>put<s%> them on <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> his <S%H1121>son:<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall be <S%H622>taken,<s%> and shall die <S%H4191>there.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded:<s%> and they went <S%H5927>up<s%> into <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all the <S%H5712>congregation.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6584>stripped<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> of his <S%H899>garments,<s%> and <S%H3847>put<s%> them on <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> his <S%H1121>son;<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> there on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain:<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

When all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H175>Aaron<s%> was <S%H1478>dead,<s%> they <S%H1058>wept<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> even all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
